telarge puhunukarithwayen pasugiya wasare pilipinaye di shri lanka kandayama daskam dakwuwa da, malesiyawa athin dawantha parajayak labimata owunta siduwiya.aasiyanu ragbi tharagawaliye shri lankiya manpethaaasiyawe ragbi adhikarithwaya darana “aasiyanu ragbi aayathanaya” (pera – aasiyanu ragbi papandu sangamaya) wisin 2008 wasare sita warshika ragbi tharagawaliyak handunwa dena ladi…2017 aasiyanu ragbi tharagawaliye shri lankawa sahabhagi wana kandaya thula pilipinaya, eksath arabi emir rajyaya saha sathkaraka malesiyawa krida karana athara wides kridakayan kihipa denekuge da sahaya labana malesiyawa ehi di shri lankawata prabala abhiyogayak wanu athi.ada (20) sita arambaena sathi thunaka puhunu sasiyakin anathuruwa shri lanka 15 samajika ragbi kandayama malesiyawa bala pitath we.>> thawath ragbi puwath sandaha piwisenna – ragbi krida pituwata <<
